name: Kicks (itch)
description:
Kicks offers thousands of people to play various street soccer games with a wide variety of users, a completely new experience.

Kicks is a team-based action football game that lets you experience the joy of football as it was meant to be played more easily and quickly through thrilling tension and a competitive spirit. ... Train your own customized and unique characters to dominate the football field!

Create account:  https://kicks-online.com.mx
